PRODUCTS

  • NEAR THRESHOLD ANALOG

CLOCK GENERATOR / PLLs

We offer a variety of LC and Ring-based phase-locked loops for general purpose clocking. Our solutions come with programmable input and feedback dividers that allow flexible frequency tuning. Our products are optimized to meet the challenges of advanced process nodes, and are seamlessly integrateable into larger mixed-signal systems.

LOCKED LOOPS

We offer completely digital, high precision delay locked loops. Our DLLs can generate any delays from 0 to 360 degrees. The current selection of our DLLs operates from 100MHz to 1GHz with sub-ps stage-to-stage mismatch.

PROGRAMMABLE OSCILLATORS

We offer a wide range of digitally programmable LC & ring oscillators. Our oscillators are compact and self contained that can be used in a number of applications. The current selection offers frequency ranges between 100kHz to 2.7 GHz in a number of process technologies.

PULSE WIDTH MODULATORS

We offer general purpose, high precision pulse width modulators (PWM)s for a variety of applications. Our digitally controlled PWMs offer 5% to 50% duty cycle control with 10 bit resolution.

Foundry Process Input Frequency Applications Datasheet
TSMC CMN65GP 300-500MHz General
Purpose PWM 		Datasheet

NEAR THRESHOLD ANALOG

Our team specializes in near-threshold (NTC), and sub-threshold designs. We’ve designed and implemented a number of timing circuits for ultra-low power SoCs. We have demonstrated the most efficient clocking system for near threshold SoCs for the IoT applications.
